item.title: Yield strength of high entropy alloys
item.description: 論文覚書． B. Yin and W. A. Curtin, “Origin of high strength in the CoCrFeNiPd high-entropy alloy,” Mater. Res. Lett., vol. 8, no. 6, pp. 209–215, 2020. B. Yin, S. Yoshida, N. Tsuji, and W. A. Curtin, “Yield strength and misfit volumes of
